name: Earth 2150
description: The installer will raise the default FPS limit of 20 to 60 FPS and increase the maximum allowed zoom level and camera angles for convenience. The increased framerate will speed up some animations but shouldn't affect gameplay.
notes:
- The game crashes with aspect ratios wider than 16:10 when opening the research menu (F2 key). Select a 16:10 or more narrow resolution to work around this issue.
- Playing back the intro movie doesn't work, please disable it in the setup tool.
- To change the FPS limit of 60 FPS edit the value of "graphrate" in the file $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Earth 2150/autoexec.con
- To play the game without the modifications to framerate and camera delete $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Earth 2150/autoexec.con

task.description: Please select the desired resolution. Note: Resolutions wider than 16:10 make the game crash in the research menu (F2 key) and the OpenGL renderer does not work. Also uncheck "Play intro" otherwise the game won't launch.
task.name: wineexec

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Earth 2150/Earth2150.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI /DIR="C:/GOG Games/Earth
      2150"
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directmusic
    arch: win32
    description: Installing directmusic
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: cinepak
    arch: win32
    description: Installing cinepak
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: amstream
    arch: win32
    description: Installing amstream
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: icodecs
    arch: win32
    description: Installing icodecs
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: amstream.dll
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/system32/regsvr32.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: quartz.dll
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/system32/regsvr32.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: 'Please select the desired resolution. Note: Resolutions wider than
      16:10 make the game crash in the research menu (F2 key) and the OpenGL renderer
      does not work. Also uncheck "Play intro" otherwise the game won''t launch.'
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Earth 2150/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_file:
    content: 'graphrate 60

      graph.zoom.max 300

      graph.limited.view 0'
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Earth 2150/autoexec.con
wine:
  overrides:
    dsound.dll: builtin
